property.name: targetStringCollection
property.label: Target String Collection
property.description: These strings will be used both for what the user sees in the button bar and the value that is passed out of the button bar when the user clicks

property.name: targetStringCSV
property.label: Enter the labels of all the screen
property.description: Please enter the screen names by comma separated

property.name: selectedTarget
property.label: Selected Target
property.description: The label of the button that the user clicked on
